name: Full House (NTRE)
description:
After each fast paced round the store opens for five seconds! Buy a card!
In this multiplayer game you will have to sacrifice some of your beloved abilities to gain new ones! Buy more run speed with your jump height or trade your health for increased damage!

Controls: WASD - move around!

Mouse - look around!

Mouse Button - Shoot!

1,2,3,4 - Switch Weapon!

R - Reload! Space - Jump!

For online multiplayer open port 7777
